title: Nice Imitation (2U106)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Stealth. Plays to your support area. Response: If a Hobbit is about to take a wound, discard this condition to prevent that wound.
Lore:	”'Very life-like!… But what will happen when they have penetrated the disguise?'”
Rarity:	U
